channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Trump defends key negotiator after leaked phone call appears to show him coaching Russia
item.description: A transcript of the call appears to show Steve Witkoff coaching his Russian counterpart on how they could get a better deal to end the war in Ukraine
item.content:encoded:
A transcript of the call appears to show Steve Witkoff coaching his Russian counterpart on how they could get a better deal to end the war in Ukraine

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Franco Ordo√±ez

item.title: 2 National Guard members wounded in 'targeted' attack in D.C., authorities say
item.description: Local police officials say the suspect is in custody and the motive remains unclear. Following the attack, the Trump administration ordered 500 more Guard troops to D.C.
item.content:encoded:
Local police officials say the suspect is in custody and the motive remains unclear. Following the attack, the Trump administration ordered 500 more Guard troops to D.C.

(Image credit: Tyrone Turner)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: 4 marketing tricks to not fall for this holiday season
item.description: Retailers use marketing techniques to get you to spend more, like creating a false sense of urgency or creating artificial discounts. Outsmart the gimmicks with these tips.
item.content:encoded:
Retailers use marketing techniques to get you to spend more, like creating a false sense of urgency or creating artificial discounts. Outsmart the gimmicks with these tips.

(Image credit: Mininyx Doodle)
item.dc:creator: Marielle Segarra

item.title: Medicare negotiated lower prices for 15 drugs, including 71% off Ozempic and Wegovy
item.description: Medicare announced 15 lower drugs after a second round of negotiations with pharmaceutical companies. The drugs include Ozempic and also drugs to treat asthma, breast cancer and leukemia.
item.content:encoded:
Medicare announced 15 lower drugs after a second round of negotiations with pharmaceutical companies. The drugs include Ozempic and also drugs to treat asthma, breast cancer and leukemia.

(Image credit: Eric Thayer)
item.dc:creator: Sydney Lupkin

item.title: How to watch the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade
item.description: The Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade is back this year and promises to be bigger than ever. Here's a preview of what to expect and how to watch.
item.content:encoded:
The Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade is back this year and promises to be bigger than ever. Here's a preview of what to expect and how to watch.

(Image credit: Eugene Gologursky)
item.dc:creator: Ivy Buck

item.title: Soldiers in Guinea-Bissau announce their government takeover on state TV
item.description: Soldiers in Guinea-Bissau appeared on state TV saying they have seized power in the country, following reports of gunshots near the presidential palace.
item.content:encoded:
Soldiers in Guinea-Bissau appeared on state TV saying they have seized power in the country, following reports of gunshots near the presidential palace.

(Image credit: TGB Guinea-Bissau)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: The Georgia election interference case against Trump and others has been dropped
item.description: The historic Georgia election interference case against President Trump and allies for their efforts to overturn the 2020 election is no more.
item.content:encoded:
The historic Georgia election interference case against President Trump and allies for their efforts to overturn the 2020 election is no more.

(Image credit: Pete Marovich)
item.dc:creator: Sam Gringlas

item.title: At long last, the mystery of lightning on Mars is solved
item.description: A chance discovery by a NASA rover on Mars shows that the red planet has a form of lightning, which researchers had suspected for decades but never seen.
item.content:encoded:
A chance discovery by a NASA rover on Mars shows that the red planet has a form of lightning, which researchers had suspected for decades but never seen.

(Image credit: NASA/JPL/Caltech/University of Arizona)
item.dc:creator: Nell Greenfieldboyce

item.title: Death toll in Hong Kong high-rise fire rises to 44, with 279 reported missing
item.description: Hong Kong leader John Lee has said 36 people were reported killed in the fire that spread through a dense high-rise residential housing complex Wednesday. He said another 279 people were reported missing.
item.content:encoded:
Hong Kong leader John Lee has said 36 people were reported killed in the fire that spread through a dense high-rise residential housing complex Wednesday. He said another 279 people were reported missing.

(Image credit: Yan Zhao)
item.dc:creator: Emily Feng

item.title: Our readers' tales of kindness will surprise you, warm your heart and make you smile
item.description: We invited you to share acts of kindness. The topics include new shoes, a basket of berries that aren't very tasty and an unexpected twist for someone treating the person behind them in line.
item.content:encoded:
We invited you to share acts of kindness. The topics include new shoes, a basket of berries that aren't very tasty and an unexpected twist for someone treating the person behind them in line.

(Image credit: Ana Caroline de Lima)
item.dc:creator: Laurel Dalrymple
